transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Hello?
Executive: Ji meri baat Dhruvi mein ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir good evening, main Pallavi baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART se, senior manager, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Badhiya bataiye.
Executive: Haan ji, sir aapka ek feedback aaya hai that you are not satisfied with the interaction with our account manager Madhavi and aap matlab aapne feedback diya hai ki aap satisfied nahi hai. So wohi mujhe jaanna tha sir kahan pe dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Sir Madhavi nahi aap logo ka jo bhi account manager hai woh log bas call karte hain unka jo call time hai woh complete karna chahte hain. Madhavi se pehle bhi mera do account manager tha. Mere 10 10 mahine ho gaya mera subscription liya hua hai aapka, theek hai? Pichle saal ka liya hua tha maine. Toh un log jab bhi call karte hain un log har time try karte hain blame karna ki sir aapne ye nahi kiya, aapne woh nahi kiya, aapka ye bhi nahi hua, aapka woh nahi hua, har time blaming. Jab mera koi problem main bolna chahta hun unka nahi hai. Unka se aap system pe aao, aap login karo, aap ye karo, aap woh karo. Ab main pe main thodi karne ke liye kiya hun. Ab mujhe ye bhi pata hai ki IndiaMART ka internal policy hai ki unko daily ka call time dikhana hota hai. But iska matlab aise call time increase karna toh koi possibility nahi hai na. Agar problem diya ja raha hai toh problem kyunki main pay kiya hun toh mera specific problem main raise kiya hun toh aapko sunna hoga solve karna hoga. Yehi toh kaam hai na account manager ka. Account manager ya senior manager jo bhi aap bolo. Toh un logo mein se koi bhi woh kaam nahi karte. Ye aapka process ka fault hai ya individual ka fault I don't know. Toh aaj phir Madhavi ne call kiya tha 10 mahine ho gaya. 10 mahine se mera jo bhi itne baar maine itne din kam se kam pakad lijiye 100 ghante baat ho gaya hoga aap logo ki team ke saath. Par mera koi revenue nahi aa raha, kuch nahi aa raha. Lead mere ko matlab aisa aisa lead aa raha hai ek ghante pehle lead avail kiya hua client bol raha hai ki main toh do din pehle mera requirement fulfilled hai. Mujhe aisa bhi lead mila hai ki woh IndiaMART se aapka job ka inquiry kar raha tha koi candidate. Toh main ye jab point unse raise kar raha hun unko solve karna hi nahi hai. Aur most of the din aapka jo account manager unko pata hi nahi hai ki kaun sa unko kaun sa account allocate kiya gaya hai. Mere pure portfolio mein ek hi product hai hoodie. Woh aaj phone kar usi hoodie hoodie mein bol raha hai mera product pehle aap dekho. Mera sports goods goods ka product hai jo 12 mahine chal raha hai. Unko nahi aapka winter mein ye woh matlab without product knowledge koi sensible topic nahi hai na koi solution hai. Ye aapka main sirf Madhavi nahi pehle ke jitne bhi account manager the sabka same scene hai. Toh mujhe toh koi fayda nahi mila toh main unse bol diya ki aise agar solution mujhe agar koi result milta hai after 10 months aise nahi ki ek do teen mahine hua hai. Aur mera iske liye dedicated ek banda allocate kiya hua hai mere team ka for IndiaMART ke calling ke liye. Toh woh banda regularly filter karke aapke call receive karta hai but 10 mahine mein kuch nahi mila mere ko. Aur jab bhi koi phone karta hai for solution main bolta hun they are blaming us only.
Executive: Sir itna bhi blaming it's a area of improvement that we can improve. Toh 10 mahine baad mujhe toh main bola isliye mujhe koi expectation nahi hai IndiaMART se. IndiaMART se mera 10 mahine ho gaya toh mera experience bahut kharab hai. Toh jab tak mujhe relevant lead ke liye maine kiya tha 10 mahine mein bhi agar mera relevancy nahi mila toh ab toh mere ko ispe kaam karna either jaise bola ki mere mujhe kaam karna nahi aata IndiaMART pe toh mujhe nahi karna. Main focus karunga dusre point pe. Aur agar aapko mujhe continue rakhna hai mera partnership further pure subscription then aap logo ko kuch sochna hoga ki kaise mere ko aap winning situation mein revenue de sako. Bas sirf discussion karke aap sir online call pe aa jao record karke sir aap avail 10 minute baat kiye ho aap ye kiye ho ye discussion kabhi woh scene nahi hota business talk.
Executive: Sir aap dekhiye aap keh rahe hain ki hum agar aap se baat kar rahe hain toh hum aapke benefit ke liye baat nahi kar rahe hain hum hamare benefit ke liye baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Exactly kyunki 10 mahine se ye chal raha hai aur ye pehla call nahi hai na.
Executive: 10 mahine se aap ye keh rahe hain ki lekin sir 10 mahine mein 10 mein se paanch baar toh aisa hua hoga na ki hum kuch improvement karna chah rahe hain aapke profile mein uske liye meri team aap se discussion kar rahi hai.
Customer: Maine toh kiya hai na discussion maine aaj thodi maine pehle feedback diya 10 mahine baad maine feedback mein this is not satisfied diya maine pehle thodi diya.
Executive: Sir your feedback is accepted. We take your feedback ki hume definitely isme improvement karna chahiye rather than just talking. Aap ye keh rahe hain na we are just talking we are not doing anything for you.
Customer: Yeah agar aap logo ka jo account team ka account manager team ka aap logo ne jo SOP bana ke rakha hai woh bahut kharab hai. Aur us pe aapko kaam karna chahiye kyunki unko woh log bhi toh ek matlab normal duniya record ki aap logo ke executive unko jaise aap log train karoge ki aise baat karna hai woh log apna pitch same de rahe hain. Kyunki woh toh copyrighted pitch hai unka. Toh us pe koi modification customization nahi hai. Toh unko pehle solve wohi karna hai na end of the day koi bhi aap logo ka aur main toh free customer nahi hun na aapka paid customer hun. 10 minute ek saal ka subscription liya hua customer hun. Toh mujhe kuch dikha tha isliye ek saal ka subscription liya tha. Aur after 10 months agar main ye bol raha hun toh main sach mein disappointed hun. Toh aap logo ko khud is pe sochna padega. Kaise winning situation agar main kal abhi bhi do mahine baki hai maine Madhavi ko bhi wohi bola. Aap logo ko sab mera data hai 10 mahine mein mere kaun traffic aa raha hai kya nahi kya product the mere paas product sare visible hai sab listed hai sab hai. Aap dekho 10 mahine mein agar mujhe result aata hai well fine main aage future mein continue karunga aapke saath agar do mahine baki hai mera nahi aata okay thank you no issue business mein matlab hota hai.
Executive: Not just a problem sir you we it's it's a gentle maybe the way she was talking to you maybe it could maybe it was not nice but it's just a gentle reminder for you that your sometimes you know our suppliers are not aware that that the 10 months are over nine months are over so it's a gentle reminder that that they can plan for the package and if you want they want to continue if they don't want to continue so we work accordingly right so no problem sir you have two months left we will be serving you for two months we will be helping you no problem and if you feel like continue if you feel like continuing sir you can continue like in the month of business talk.
Customer: Business mein love matlab profit loss dono hota hai maine ek invest kiya agar mujhe profitable dikha main further invest karunga bigger invest karunga. In profitable nahi dikha main usko cut down karke naya jagah sir simple business isme koi kharab achcha kuch nahi hai. Toh wohi main aap logo ko agar feedback ke liye puche that's why maine wohi bola toh unko jab baat kar rahe hain toh unko solution pe baat karna chahiye.
Executive: Ji ji definitely we will take your feedback sir. Moreover online dekhiye hamara kya rehta hai na agar aap bhi online hai main bhi online hun toh agar hum bolte hain sir aap online aa jaiye it's a very good thing. I'm not defending my team but isliye ki agar aap online hain.
Customer: Woh main aapko karunga woh main woh main kar chuka hun. Ab na dekho main simple ek cheez batata hun main aapko ₹33000 diya hun saal bhar ke liye. Mere ko abhi tak aapke portal se 10 mahine aur ek cheez main pehle 6 mahina aap logo ko pura entertain kiya. Pehle koi Abhinav tha woh banda aapka manager uske baad change hoke aaya Madhavi Mishra hai. Toh har bande ko maine starting se entertain kar karke hi aaya hun. Ab mera bhi business mein hi 8-9 ghante ka hi time period hai. Isme se agar har hafte 10 din mein main aap logo ko 20 minute aadha ghanta dene lagunga na toh mera dusra dhandha nahi chalega. Toh mere ko bhi ek hi sochna padega ki isko main already itna time de chuka hun toh mujhe.
Executive: It ha you can say no if my team is saying ki aap online aa jaiye if you are comfortable you can join with the video.
Customer: Dekho usme koi point nahi hai discussion is right but sir aap isko negative mat lijiye sir you are not taking the same a solution maine jo bola ki pehle output se focus kariye. I paid money so focus on only output ye discussion kaise karna hai this is not the process. Customer agar pay karta hai customer ko solution main bhi business kar raha hun mere ko koi customer pay karta hai customer ko main kapda bechta hun bana ke agar main customer se paisa le raha hun mera kaam customer ko achcha garment dena hai. Customer toh nahi dekhna ki mere ghar pe kisi ko bukhar hai mera process kya hai mere ko suta kharidne mein delay hua ye customer ka nahi hai. Agar jab paisa liya jata hai uske baad customer aapko sirf dekhna customer dekh ki mera output kya aa raha hai. Kaise aa raha hai is your process iske liye hi toh aapko paisa diya ja raha hai. Toh aapko usme sochna chahiye aur 10 mahine ho gaye jo aap bol rahe ho ki 10 mahine se main sun raha hun toh aur nahi sunna. Toh abhi aap solution pe dhyan kijiye agar mujhe result aata hai as per business terms koi personal kuch nahi hai business terms pe agar mujhe aata hai solution is fine agar nahi aata aur further agar mujhe nahi aata agar mujhe koi phir se aap logo ka feedback aayega koi top management ka aayega toh mujhe phir ko phir se review dena padega. Toh kyunki maine money invest kiya.
Executive: No problem aap sir I think aapko services aap use kar rahe hain achche se use kar rahe hain koi dikkat nahi hai aap services use kariye two months theek hai you can save my number I am the senior manager here in Noida head office. Main Madhavi ki manager baat kar rahi hun in case you need my help I'll drop you my whatsapp number.
Customer: Even even even sir main ek colleague is your Kolkata regional manager. Anik Anik Choudhary. So I know all the processes of your internal procedure everything.
Executive: So just in case sir you are not satisfied with the resolution from Madhavi just you can be in touch with me I will will share my whatsapp number with you.
Customer: Madhavi ho koi bhi ho mujhe koi matlab kisi personal se kisi ko nahi hai main kya bola aap logo ke paas mera profile hai mera account 10 mahine se bana hua hai woh aap logo ne hi approve kiya tha aap logo ke team ne hi banaya tha maine sara data provide karne ke baad toh sab kuch kiya hua hai aap log usme dekhiye ki mere ko relevant lead kaise mil sake mere ko conversion aa sake is pe aap log focus kariye that's all ye discussion karke kuch nahi hota. Discussion jo hai ho chuka hai abhi output pe focus do mahine baki hai focus on output agar aap log internally kaam kariye apne team ke saath ki is client ko hum output kaise de sake aapko discussion is pe karna chahiye na ki mujhe samjhana ki sir aise ho sakta tha. Aapko khud internally discuss karo ki is client ko hum kaise output de sakte hain. Is client ka kya hai mera pura 10 mahine ka graph main kab lead lead attend kiya hun kab lead maine avail nahi kiya kis din ki kab kab kiya hun kitne lead sab data aapke paas hai IndiaMART ka data process bahut strong hai I know toh sab data aapke paas hai aap log internally usko study kariye kaise mere ko aap log result de paoge toh us pe focus kariye I think usme jyada behtar hoga cheez.
Executive: Theek hai sir we will you know correct we will work on the output part sir and jaisa aap keh rahe hain aap logo ka internally koi kaam nahi hota maine 10 mahine mein internal kaam koi nahi dikha that's the issue. Ye ab main call rakh dunga aap bhul jaoge ki aapko bhi might be 30 40 50 client se baat karna hota hai toh aap log usko nikal jaoge but ek call ke baad ek client ke upar ki isko output kaise de sakte hain is pe jo kaam karna ye aapke aap mein se leke hai. Us pe kaam kariye. Theek hai agar feedback ke liye call kiya tha I think aapko feedback mil chuka hai.
Executive: Ji ji sir sir we are closing the feedback sir given by you and we will work on the output part I just check your catalog also what is there in the catalog if there is any correction we will do it and if you I am sure I will definitely see some improvement little bit maybe just 10% 20% but there will be some improvement in the the quality of lead sir and I'll take the feedback next month. Okay?
Customer: Sure sure okay thank you.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not satisfied with account manager interaction.

- Account managers focus on call time completion.

- Account managers blame customer instead of solving problems.

- Leads are irrelevant and not meeting requirements.

- Account managers lack product knowledge.

- No revenue generated despite subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the feedback and improvement areas.

- Executive assured focus on output and catalog review.

- Executive shared contact for further assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will take feedback next month.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account manager, feedback, revenue, output
